ovdesc.p: This file will get updated when MT502 is being sent to the broker.
This file is also used to hold details regarding status of inward MT509 and MT513 for all the brokers

desc.p: This field forms associated multivalue set along with BROKER. NO field and tells the status of broker for particular order.
If BR.MSG.STATUS is ACCEPTED then it means broker has accepted modification/cancellation of MT502
If BR.MSG.STATUS is REJECTED then it means broker has rejected modification/cancellation of MT502
If BR.MSG.STATUS is NULL then it means awaiting acceptance/reject from broker
If BR.MSG.STATUS is LIVE then it means all brokers for the particular order have sent acceptance/reject
This field holds the value in the field BROKER of SEC.OPEN.ORDER. This forms associated multivalue set along with BR.MSG.STATUS field
This is a system updated field
ID will be same as SEC.OPEN.ORDER ID
